lines.text: You know what I think? I think the Go Wizard here is just like the Stop Wizard.
He ain't breathin', there's a hole in his chest, and there's blood everywhere.
You really want to try and explain all that without sayin' he's dead?
I think I do want to do that, Leo.
Let's start with the no-breathing thing, yeah?
That <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> spell prevents <c=#FF00FF>all</c> movement- including heartbeats!
The target's in a kind of stasis, like this. He can look super dead, without actually being dead!
But there's still the <c=#FF00FF>bleedin' hole in his chest</c> to account for, right?
Uh... hm. I don't think that's too hard to figure out, either...
I'll believe it when I see it.
